description:
ScreenFlow5.0.1 will help you do three simple steps Record, Edit and Share.

How ScreenFlow is used

1-Demo Your Software such as Software or website developers.

2- Demo Your iPhone App

3-Create Promotional Videos

4-Educate Your Students

5-Train Your Audience

6-Create epic content

7-Edit Your Video

What’s new about ScreenFlow 5.0.1

  • Timesaving, powerful editing features

With the New snapback actions allow you to revert your video state with just a click. With action templates you can choose from a default list of actions and save your own favorite actions.

  • Direct access to iPhoto and iTunes Library

You will get access to iPhoto and iTunes libraries directly from the ScreenFlow Media Library.

  • More options for recording Everything

iOS recording

Your iPhone and iPad screens can now be recorded right into ScreenFlow, just like your iSight camera. Create stunning App previews—with touch callouts that mimic finger gestures.

Recording Preview

Quickly confirm you're in shot and you've got the right angle. Recording preview shows you what's being recorded along with elapsed recording time.

With the new ScreenFlow5.0.1 it has a unique Features that will help the user do a lot of things.

  • Highest quality recording

ScreenFlow has the best screen capture available even on Retina Displays.

  • Record everything, edit later

ScreenFlow's advanced algorithms only encode areas of change on your screen, so you can capture your entire screen with the highest quality and keep your file sizes low.

  • iOS recording

Record your iPhone or iPad screen for high quality app demos.
title: Record Your Computer Screen As Expert for Mac Users
